title: One UI 4.1 update now rolling out to Galaxy Z Fold 3, Flip 3 w/ features from Galaxy S22
content:
One UI 4.1 debuted with the Galaxy S22, S22+, and S22 Ultra with some new features but no big updates to Samsung’s skin on top of Android as a whole. Now, those new camera, editing, and Google Duo features are expanding to Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Flip owners with One UI 4.1 rolling out now.

more…

The post One UI 4.1 update now rolling out to Galaxy Z Fold 3, Flip 3 w/ features from Galaxy S22 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has officially launched the rollout of One UI 4.1 to its Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Flip 3, bringing features from the Galaxy S22 series.
